titleStmt.title: A declaration or denouncing of war vvhich Sultan-Mahomet, the present emperor of the Turks, sent to the emperor of Germany, dated March 25th 1683, from Adrianople ... / faithfully translated out of High Dutch, brought over by the last forraign mayle.
titleStmt.author: Mehmed IV, Sultan of the Turks, 1642-1693.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
